tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Janice is a pleasure to work with ! We visited her earlier today and her diagnosis was meticulous and the best part is her ability to build confidence to cope the situation and doesn’t prescribe medication unless and otherwise absolutely required. We traveled from abroad and found a comparable care with what we see in the West.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A doctor with patience and smiling face . The confidence which we get after visiting her is great . She answers to all queries .She doesn't gets annoyed with our health related questions. Asks to get the tests done only if required . Guides the patient and the parents of kid well . Her experience gets reflected in the treatment. Does not give medicines unnecessary and antibiotics is given only if required. Dr Janice makes the kids feel very comfortable with her talk and actions. A very good doctor for your child , thank you so much Dr Janice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very understanding. Takes time to listen to us as well as the child.  Gives very clear explanation for any question I ask. Very approachable, my kid who is usually scared of docs, is very comfortable with her. On the whole, a wonderful doctor 😊😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My new born baby gal was taken gud care as she had respiratory and heart beat problems initially  and admitted in NICU FOR 2DAYS. Under Dr janice guidence baby gal recovered well and now the baby is fine. Thanks to Dr janice treatment and kind advice. 
I personally thank for the team of pediatricians at ovum.
